column4: Pre-workshop survey: What is the operating system that you will use during the course (on your laptop)?
column5: Pre-workshop survey: Which version of operating system are you using? If your operating system is Linux, which distribution are you using? This will help us to create more targeted installation instructions.

column8: Pre-workshop survey: Are you using automated testing in your programming project(s)?
column9: Pre-workshop survey: Are you using code coverage analysis in your programming project(s)? These are tools and services like Gcov, Cobertura, Codecov, Coveralls, Code Climate, etc.
column10: Pre-workshop survey: Are you employing code review in your programming project(s)?
column11: Pre-workshop survey: Are you using the Travis or Jenkins or GitLab CI continuous integration service in your programming project(s)?
column12: Pre-workshop survey: How do you document your code?
column13: Pre-workshop survey: Are you using a web-based repository for your code(s)? Which ones?

column19: Pre-workshop survey: What do you expect to get from this course?
